resources.string: The Temperature in Lowell, Massachusetts is: 52 degrees

My Place of Birth: Nashua, New Hampshire. Nashua is the second largest city in New Hampshire
Where I Currently Live: Hollis, New Hampshire. I have lived in Hollis for 16 years. Hollis is known for its farming.
Where I Would Like to Live: Hollis, New Hampshire.
